attributes.action: Make it easier for unaffordable debt to be cancelled
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Credit agreements last for a certain term, therefore when that agreement term lapses and money is still owed, finance companies should be obliged to write off the remaining balance, relieving the burden of debt on consumers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
